item.title: Winners of the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Knowledge Awards are influential figures in promoting knowledge
item.description:
Source: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Knowledge Foundation. A representative from the MiSK Foundation receives the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Knowledge Award. The Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Knowledge Award recipients, celebrated on November 21st, share a common goal: shaping the future. This award acknowledges those who significantly contribute to the creation and dissemination of knowledge globally. Among the winners, Saudi Arabia’s MiSK Foundation focuses on developing educational institutions and bolstering scientific research...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/winners-of-the-mohammed-bin-rashid-al-maktoum-knowledge-awards-are-influential-figures-in-promoting-knowledge/
